siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Offline access to all Pinboard bookmarks. Filter with smart collections. Share extension, drag-and-drop, Shortcuts app. Widgets, Spotlight search, Handoff, multitasking.
blogPost.body: Offline access to all Pinboard bookmarks. Filter with smart collections. Share extension, drag-and-drop, Shortcuts app. Widgets, Spotlight search, Handoff, multitasking.
blogPost.title: Pins for Pinboard - Modern iOS/macOS Pinboard app for 2021
blogPost.author: Anh Do

localize.description: 离线访问所有 Pinboard 书签。使用智能收藏进行过滤。分享扩展、拖放、快捷方式应用。小工具、Spotlight 搜索、Handoff、多任务处理。
離線訪問所有 Pinboard 書籤。使用智能收藏進行過濾。分享擴展、拖放、快捷方式應用。小工具、Spotlight 搜索、Handoff、多任務處理。

previous.excerpt: "The quality of our relationships determines the quality of our lives." -Esther Perel Call Your Friends helps you develop the habits and skills to build closer connections with friends and family through simple text reminders.
previous.title: Call Your Friends - Dramatically raise the quality of your friendships.

localize.description: "我们的关系质量决定了我们生活的质量。" --Esther Perel《给你的朋友打电话》帮助你养成通过简单的文字提醒与朋友和家人建立更紧密联系的习惯和技能。
localize.tagline: 大幅提升你的友谊质量。

localize.description: "我們的關係質量決定了我們生活的質量。" --Esther Perel《給你的朋友打電話》幫助你養成通過簡單的文字提醒與朋友和家人建立更緊密聯繫的習慣和技能。
localize.tagline: 大幅提升你的友誼質量。

next.excerpt: This is an app for people to find boba drinks nearby. It allows you to rate individual boba drinks, so that you don't have to read through lots of reviews to see which boba is good.
next.title: Bubble - App for finding and rating Boba

localize.description: 这是一款为人们寻找附近的波霸饮品的应用。它可以让你对各个波霸饮品进行评价，这样你就不用通过大量的评论来查看哪家波霸饮品好了。
localize.tagline: 用于寻找和评级波霸的应用程序

localize.description: 這是一款爲人們尋找附近的波霸飲品的應用。它可以讓你對各個波霸飲品進行評價，這樣你就不用通過大量的評論來查看哪家波霸飲品好了。
localize.tagline: 用於尋找和評級波霸的應用程序
